title: Dilemma
creator_credit: John Halas, Computer Creations USA and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: A fully digitised computer-animated film which shows the progress of civilisation throughout the ages, but poses the question whether man will use his inventive abilities for destruction or as the key to progressive creation.
creator_credit_for_label: John Halas, Computer Creations USA and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
description: A fully digitised computer-animated film which shows the progress of civilisation throughout the ages, but poses the question whether man will use his inventive abilities for destruction or as the key to progressive creation.
